search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for CallRail (callrail.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for CallRail can be found at: [https://www.callrail.com/pricing/](https://www.callrail.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Compare Pricing Plans & Start Free Trial | CallRail

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: CallRail logo](https://main--dotcom-prod.netlify.app/assets/svg/logos/callrail-logotype.svg)](https://www.callrail.com/)

Call Tracking pricing plans
---------------------------

Call Tracking + AI plans
------------------------

Call Tracking + AI plans
------------------------

Prove ROI and discover insights with packages that  
start with 5 numbers & 250 minutes.

Save up to 10% with a yearly plan

Call Tracking +  
Form Tracking
-------------------------------

90/mo

plus additional usage

Attribute form submissions as well as calls back to marketing sources.

Everything in **Call Tracking**, plus:

*   Form tracking
*   Custom form builder

[See what’s included](https://www.callrail.com/pricing#compare) See what’s included

Call Tracking  
Complete
------------------------

135/mo

plus additional usage

Track, analyze, and optimize calls and forms in one solution.

Everything in **Call Tracking**, plus:

*   Call transcripts
*   Keyword analysis
*   Form tracking
*   Custom form builder

[See what’s included](https://www.callrail.com/pricing#compare) See what’s included

 ![Image 2](https://main--dotcom-prod.netlify.app/assets/svg/sparkle.svg) AI-Powered Insights

Premium Conversation Intelligence™

Premium Conversation Intelligence™

Optimize your marketing with AI insights from every call.

Call summaries & sentiments. Analyze and review each call at a glance.

Enhanced attribution. Extract rich attribution data from conversations.

Multi-conversation insights. Spot conversation trends in one report.

![Image 3: Premium Conversation Intelligence infographic](https://main--dotcom-prod.netlify.app/assets/images/pci_card_image.png)

Call Tracking + AI
------------------

50/mo

plus additional usage

Track, transcribe, and analyze calls with AI for greater marketing insights.

**Includes:**

**Call Tracking**

*   5 numbers and 250 minutes
*   Call & text tracking and attribution
*   Call recording and routing

**Conversation Intelligence®**

*   250 call transcription minutes
*   Keyword analysis 
*   Automation rules

[See what’s included](https://www.callrail.com/pricing#compare) See what’s included

See all plan options

Total Lead Tracking + AI
------------------------

95/mo

plus additional usage

Attribute calls and forms to marketing sources. Analyze conversations with AI.

**Everything in Call Tracking + AI, plus:**

**Form Tracking**

*   Form tracking and attribution
*   Custom form builder
*   Form submission automation rules
*   Multi-touch attribution
*   Cost-per-lead report

[See what’s included](https://www.callrail.com/pricing#compare) See what’s included

Call Tracking + Premium AI
--------------------------

130/mo

plus additional usage

Track and analyze calls, plus unlock richer lead insights with Premium AI.

**Everything in Call Tracking + AI , plus:**

**Premium Conversation Intelligence™**

*   10,000 call transcription minutes
*   Call sentiment analysis
*   Conversation summaries
*   AI-generated attribution insights
*   Weekly conversation trend reports

[See what’s included](https://www.callrail.com/pricing#compare) See what’s included

See all plan options

Complete Suite

175/mo

plus additional usage

**Everything in Call Tracking + AI, plus:**

*   Call summaries & sentiment analysis
*   AI-generated attribution insights 
*   Weekly conversation trend reports

FAQ
---

### How does the free trial work?

Every account starts with a 14-day free trial. We don’t require a credit card to get started, and we won’t bill you until your trial is over.

### What if I go over my included usage?

We’ll continue to track your leads so that your reports stay up-to-date. Once you go over your included usage, you’ll be billed at the “Additional Usage” rates on your current plan. You can always upgrade your pricing plan as your business grows.

### Which countries do you support?

CallRail is available in the United States, Canada, the UK and Australia. For International pricing, see our [UK](https://www.callrail.com/pricing/united-kingdom) and [Australia](https://www.callrail.com/pricing/australia) pricing pages.

### How will I be billed?

For customers with monthly billing, each month we'll automatically invoice your credit card for the amount of the base fee for the upcoming month and the additional usage from the previous month. For example, if you become a customer on the 15th, we’ll bill you on the 15th of each month.

For customers on a plan with annual billing, your base fee for the upcoming 12 months is due upon credit card entry. Additional usage for each previous month will be automatically billed to your credit card on the same day each month.

### Can I use CallRail and still be HIPAA compliant?

We take HIPAA compliance seriously; that’s why we’ve not only created an end-to-end solution for [health care providers](https://www.callrail.com/healthcare), but we also sign a business associate agreement (BAA) with each of our Healthcare clients. [Contact us today](mailto:sales@callrail.com) to get your BAA set up and learn about our specific Healthcare plans.

Starting at $45/month, choose the pricing plan that fits your needs. Start your free 14-day trial and discover which marketing efforts bring leads to your business.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes base subscription fees and additional usage charges.

Track and analyze calls, plus unlock richer lead insights with Premium AI.
Gain complete insight into every lead and conversation with one AI solution.

### How does the free trial work?

For customers on a plan with annual billing, your base fee for the upcoming 12 months is due upon credit card entry. Additional usage for each previous month will be automatically billed to your credit card on the same day each month.
